page.title: 15Employment in Filey.
page.content: On July the 17th we sent a small questionaire to the children of Filey Junior School.We asked about the occupations ofthe people in their families, where they worked and what sort of jobs they did. A total of 300 people were involved. 58% worked in our block and 42% work outside our block. We then looked at the people who worked in our block and tried to find the main occupations. 32% were involved in tourism.We included pubs, hotels and cafes under this heading. 16% had jobs connected with the fishing industry,either on the sea or one of the back-up jobs ashore. 22% had jobs in shops of one kind or another. Of the rest the only major employer was Dale Electric in which 4% of those surveyed were employed.
